target_markets.market_description: Cricut crafters and DIY enthusiasts who use tabletop CNC machines for crafting
pain_points: need constant supply of new SVG designs
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Cricut is a billion-dollar company, millions of shops on Etsy selling these files, majority of Etsy sellers are people with these machines

problems_validated.problem: Crafters need unlimited access to SVG design files for their Cricut machines
problems_validated.severity: High - people are actively paying for individual designs on Etsy
problems_validated.current_solutions: Individual purchases on Etsy, one-time design bundles
problems_validated.market_gap: No affordable unlimited subscription service for AI-generated designs

products_tools.name: Cricut
products_tools.use_case: tabletop CNC machine for crafters to cut materials

products_tools.name: Creative Fabrica
products_tools.metrics: around 30 million a year revenue, funded European company

business_strategies.strategy: Freemium to subscription model - offer free SVG bundle to build email list, then upsell to unlimited subscription
business_strategies.implementation: Create free bundle, run Facebook ads, capture emails, nurture with drip campaigns
business_strategies.case_study: Creative Fabrica doing 30M/year with this model

business_strategies.strategy: Build hundreds of thousands of SEO landing pages for long-tail keywords
business_strategies.implementation: Use AI to generate content for keyword-specific landing pages, leverage Shopify + Cloudflare for bulk page creation
business_strategies.expected_results: Organic traffic growth, marketplace traffic brokering
business_strategies.case_study: Similar to how marketplaces like Amazon make money from traffic brokering

problems_solutions.problem: Creating SVG designs at scale was previously expensive requiring thousands of graphic designers
problems_solutions.solution: Use AI tools and APIs to automate the entire design creation process

problems_solutions.problem: Shopify API rate limits prevent creating millions of landing pages for large SKU catalogs
problems_solutions.solution: Use Cloudflare with Shopify's new subfolder feature to bulk create collection pages
steps: Use AI to write SEO content for each page

startup_ideas.idea: AI-powered unlimited SVG subscription service for Cricut users
startup_ideas.target_market: Cricut crafters, Etsy sellers, DIY enthusiasts
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Expensive and limited access to design files for crafting machines
startup_ideas.business_model: Freemium to subscription - free bundle acquisition, then monthly/yearly unlimited access
startup_ideas.validation: Run Facebook ads to Cricut interest audiences with free bundles, measure download rates
startup_ideas.investment_needed: $10,000 total ($5,000 for ad spend, $5,000 for setup)

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not understanding how marketplaces actually make money
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Focusing on wrong revenue streams, missing the real opportunity
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand that marketplaces make money by brokering traffic and selling ads, not just transaction fees
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Amazon makes more money from ad spend than marketplace fees

growth_tactics.tactic: Facebook ads targeting Cricut website interest audiences with free SVG bundles
growth_tactics.cost_estimate: Less than $1 per download, $5,000 gets 10,000 customers
growth_tactics.results_expected: Build email list for under $1 per subscriber
